import React, { Component } from 'react' import chroma from 'chroma-js' // import { scaleThreshold } from 'd3-scale'; class PaletteShades extends Component { // palette(min, max) { // const d = (max-min)/9; // const originalColor = this.props.color.color; // const lighter = chroma(originalColor).brighten(1); // const lightest = chroma(originalColor).luminance(0.9) // const darkest = chroma(originalColor).darken(4) // return scaleThreshold() // .range([lightest, lighter, originalColor, darkest]) // .domain([min + d*1,min + d*2,min + d*3,min + d*4,min + d*5,min + d*6,min + d*7,min + d*8]); // } render(){ const originalColor = this.props.color.color; const lighter = chroma(originalColor).brighten(1).hex(); const lightest = chroma(originalColor).luminance(0.9).hex() const darkest = chroma(originalColor).darken(4).hex() const shades = chroma.scale([lightest, lighter, originalColor, darkest]) console.log(lightest, lighter, originalColor, darkest) console.log(shades(0.1).hex()) return(
